short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show speed on runs in Strava

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're like me, you don't like the fact that Strava shows pace instead of speed for runs.

Speed is just so much more tangible.

Calculating speed from pace is not trivial except for some round numbers. 

With this extension, dashboard and activity paces are calculated and adapted on the fly.

No more "4:34 min/km", it just says "13.14 km/h", so you can actually compare your run with the speed on your electric bike.

Notes:
- For now, only km/h is available.
- It also does not convert dashboard paces when you scroll down far enough.
- It also converts swimming paces, which leads to ridiculous swimming speeds. This is definitely not a bug, but a feature.
- The guy in the screenshot is me
